_header: He which eateth of this bread
Subjects: scripture texts, Engl. trans. of; translations
_description: One couplet translating ‘Qui manducat hunc panem uiuit in eternum’ (John 6.58)

BLHar3760.Transcription:
he whyche etyth of thys bredeshal euer lyue & neuer be
                    dede

TCD317.Transcription: Who so etyth this bredehe schal lyve and neuere be dede
TCD317.Editions:
Colker,  Marvin L.,
                        ed.  
             Trinity College Library, Dublin: Descriptive catalogue of the Mediaeval
                and Renaissance Latin Manuscripts.
         Aldershot, Hants.: Scolar Press, 1991: 1.639.
